chunks.zh: 各位，返程了吗？
chunks.en: Everyone, have you returned?

chunks.zh: 这个年嗖的一下，又又结束了🤦‍♂️
chunks.en: This new year ended so quickly again 🤦‍♂️

chunks.zh: 恨不得马上走，家里除了天天看我不顺眼还能干啥呢
chunks.en: I can't wait to leave. Besides disliking me every day, what else can my family do?

chunks.zh: @shmilypeter 朋友适合来我家过年。
chunks.en: @shmilypeter My friend, you should come to my house for the new year.

chunks.zh: 不是嘲讽哈，我的父母就是看不得你闲。
chunks.en: I'm not being sarcastic. My parents just can't stand seeing anyone idle.

chunks.zh: 你闲在那里就开始想办法证明你懒，然后就开始批评你。
chunks.en: If you're idle, they'll find ways to prove you're lazy and start criticizing you.

chunks.zh: 与此同时，我的工作收入虽不算拔尖，但也超过当地三倍社平一些，而他们在经济和工作关系上几乎不能给我任何帮助。
chunks.en: At the same time, my work income, while not top-notch, is still about three times the local average, but they can hardly give me any help in terms of economy or work relationships.

chunks.zh: 所以我想不明白，如果我真像他们说的那么懒，这工作和年底评优都是从天上掉下来的？
chunks.en: So I can't figure out, if I'm really as lazy as they say, did this job and the year-end evaluations just fall from the sky?

chunks.zh: 这是典型的只抓着你缺点而看不到优点的情况，而在很多方面他们自己都做不到那么好。
chunks.en: This is a typical situation where they only focus on your shortcomings and don't see your strengths, and in many ways, they themselves can't do as well.

chunks.zh: 家应该是避风港，不是学校来接受再教育的。
chunks.en: Home should be a haven, not a school for re-education.

chunks.zh: 家人间应该难得糊涂，有没有什么违法乱纪的原则问题，睁眼闭眼就过了。
chunks.en: Family members should pretend to be confused sometimes. If there are no major issues of principle involving illegal or unethical behavior, just turn a blind eye.

chunks.zh: 天天搞得家里氛围紧张，自己的想法也不能表达，我当然想早点走，而且最好不要回来
chunks.en: Creating a tense atmosphere at home every day, and not being able to express your own thoughts, of course I want to leave sooner and preferably not come back.

chunks.zh: @Frytea #21 @Livid Spam ，近期评论的内容都是
chunks.en: @Frytea #21 @Livid Spam, recent comments are all

chunks.zh: 没有
chunks.en: No

chunks.zh: 又开始新的牛马生活
chunks.en: Another round of the new wage slave life begins.

chunks.zh: 没有 开车自驾旅游中
chunks.en: No, on a road trip.

chunks.zh: 排队检票中
chunks.en: Waiting in line for ticket check.

chunks.zh: 真是太快了 😭
chunks.en: It's really too fast 😭

chunks.zh: 人在深圳，刚下飞机
chunks.en: In Shenzhen, just got off the plane.

chunks.zh: 还没，还得几天
chunks.en: Not yet, still a few days.

chunks.zh: @volvo007 和父母观念不一样，实在是折磨
chunks.en: @volvo007 Having different ideas with parents is really tormenting.

chunks.zh: 还可以休息两天
chunks.en: Still have two days to rest.

chunks.zh: @volvo007 #7 我这种一年到头在家里住的，最重要的事情就是和父母搞好关系
chunks.en: @volvo007 #7 For someone like me who lives at home all year round, the most important thing is to have a good relationship with my parents.

chunks.zh: 下下周回去，让孩子在乡下多玩几天
chunks.en: Going back the week after next, let the kids play in the countryside for a few more days.

chunks.zh: 休了 4 天，10 号上班
chunks.en: Took 4 days off, back to work on the 10th.

chunks.zh: 没抢到票
chunks.en: Didn't get a ticket.

chunks.zh: 2 月 4 号返。
chunks.en: Returning on February 4th.

chunks.zh: 低端农民工留守城市，不需要返程
chunks.en: Low-end migrant worker staying in the city, no need to return.

chunks.zh: 休到元宵呢🐶
chunks.en: Taking a break until the Lantern Festival 🐶

chunks.zh: 明天返，继续牛马
chunks.en: Returning tomorrow, continuing to be a beast of burden.
